items.name: Ventor's Gamble
flavourText: In a blaze of glory,
An anomaly defying all odds
The "unkillable" beast met the divine
And Ventor met his latest trophy.

items.name: Fate Beads
explicitMods: Gain 13% of Physical Damage as Extra Lightning Damage
+1 to Level of all Physical Skill Gems

items.name: Horror Spark
enchantMods: 10% increased Movement Speed if you haven't been Hit Recently
implicitMods: Item sells for much more to vendors
explicitMods: 24% chance to gain Onslaught for 4 seconds on Kill
8% chance to gain Elusive on Critical Strike
10% increased Attack, Cast and Movement Speed while you have Onslaught
23% increased Effect of Tailwind on you
You have Tailwind if you have dealt a Critical Strike Recently

socketedItems.secDescrText: An icy blast explodes around the caster, dealing cold damage to enemies, and leaving behind a whirling vortex which deals cold damage over time and chills enemies caught in it. If the caster targets near their Frostbolt projectiles, it will explode from a number of those projectiles instead, destroying them.
explicitMods: Deals 2317.2 Base Cold Damage per second
Modifiers to Spell Damage apply to this Skill's Damage Over Time effect
20% less Area of Effect when Cast on Frostbolt
Can explode from up to 5 Frostbolt Projectiles
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

properties.name: Spell, AoE, Duration, Cold, Curse, Hex

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, lowering their cold resistance and giving them a chance to be frozen when hit.
explicitMods: Cursed enemies have -36% to Cold Resistance
Hits against Cursed Enemies have +25% chance to Freeze
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill that can chill enemies or create chilling areas.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 20% increased Chill Duration on Enemies
44% increased Effect of Chill inflicted with Supported Skills
Enemies Chilled by Supported Skills increase Cold Damage taken by Chill Effect
Enemies in Chilling Areas from Supported Skills increase Cold Damage taken by Chill Effect
Supported Skills deal 14% more Cold Damage
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Must support both a skill that hits enemies, and a hex curse skill to work. The hex will be applied when enemies are hit by the other skill. Cannot support totems, traps, or mines. Minions cannot apply hexes this way.
explicitMods: Supported Skills apply supported Curses on Hit
You cannot Cast Supported Curse Spells
Supported Skills have 18% reduced Curse Duration
Hexes applied by Supported Curse Skills have 18% chance to affect Hexproof Enemies
+1 to Level of Supported Curse Skill Gems
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Widowhail
implicitMods: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 10 Momentum
Socketed Gems are supported by Level 10 Blind
explicitMods: 216% increased bonuses gained from Equipped Quiver
flavourText: "I loosed a volley of arrows into the heart of the man
who slew my beloved. There was no satisfaction, no
healing, no revenge. There was only... emptiness."
- Chieftainess Ahuana of the Ramako Tribe

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill gem. Once this gem reaches level 2 or above, will raise the level of supported gems. Cannot support skills that don't come from gems.

explicitMods: 63% reduced Effect of Curses on you during Effect

items.name: Hrimsorrow
implicitMods: Curse Enemies with Elemental Weakness on Hit
explicitMods: 100% of Physical Damage Converted to Cold Damage
Reflects 100 Cold Damage to Melee Attackers
flavourText: Of ancient giants, none remain,
Their only trace is timeless pain.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Take less Physical and Elemental Damage for a short time. Consumes up to 5 Endurance Charges to lengthen the buff and further lessen Physical Damage taken. Shares a cooldown with other Guard skills.
explicitMods: 20% increased Buff Duration per Endurance Charge removed
This Skill's Cooldown does not recover during its effect
15.0% less Physical Damage taken per Endurance Charge removed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Each supported spell skill will track damage you take, and be triggered when the total damage taken reaches a threshold. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Vaal skills, channelling skills, and skills with a reservation cannot be triggered.

You cannot Cast Supported Triggerable Spells directly
Trigger Supported Spells when you take 528 total Damage from Hits

socketedItems.secDescrText: This spell creates ethereal blades which orbit in an area around you, dealing damage every 0.6 seconds to all enemies in their radius. As more blades are added, the damage becomes greater and more frequent.

explicitMods: Modifiers to Skill Effect Duration also apply to this Skill's Soul Gain Prevention
hybrid.secDescrText: Creates an independently-moving vortex of ethereal blades which lasts for a duration. The vortex moves toward nearby enemies, repeatedly damaging enemies that it passes through.

items.name: Maloney's Mechanism
explicitMods: Trigger a Socketed Bow Skill when you Attack with a Bow, with a 1 second Cooldown
5% chance to Blind Enemies on Hit with Attacks
flavourText: Midnight tinkering begets midday murdering;
a sinister shaft surreptitiously shot slays a scoundrel.
I will see them again, but not until my work is done.

flavourText: Rivers of power course through your veins.

items.name: Asphyxia's Wrath
implicitMods: Gain 12% of Physical Damage as Extra Cold Damage
explicitMods: Gain 20% of Physical Damage as Extra Cold Damage
Hexes Transfer to all Enemies within 3 metres when Hexed Enemy dies
flavourText: Mist of breath
Icing to lips and throat
As the warm ones choke and fall
Upon the frozen wasteland.

items.name: Ventor's Gamble
flavourText: In a blaze of glory,
An anomaly defying all odds
The "unkillable" beast met the divine
And Ventor met his latest trophy.

items.name: The Gull
explicitMods: Trigger Level 1 Create Lesser Shrine when you Kill an Enemy
75% increased Effect of Shrine Buffs on you
50% increased Duration of Shrine Effects on you
flavourText: "It is the Gull that delivers Man unto Ancestor.
The consumer of our flesh. The seeder of our
souls unto the earth. We give the Gull his life.
The Gull gives us our Way."
- Lavianga, Advisor to Kaom

Gain Arcane Surge after Spending a total of 15 Mana on

flavourText: They were bred in a cosmic ocean of raw creation.
Feasting and drinking of the milk of the mother,
they fought to the death for every last drop.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Grants a buff which lets you deal more physical damage. When you kill an enemy while you have this buff, this skill will summon a Sentinel of Purity, or refresh the duration and life of an existing one instead if you have the maximum number of them. The Sentinels of Purity have a single-target melee attack and an area melee attack.
explicitMods: Summon a Sentinel of Purity when you Kill an Enemy
20% chance to Summon a Sentinel of Purity when you Hit a Rare or Unique Enemy
